DEFECT.DESCRIPTION: 'realloc' might return null pointer: assigning null pointer to 'model->fisherfaces_model.input', which is passed as an argument to 'realloc', will cause the original memory block to be leaked.
'realloc' might return null pointer: assigning null pointer to 'model->fisherfaces_model.class_id', which is passed as an argument to 'realloc', will cause the original memory block to be leaked.
